trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>事件，儲存格進入編輯模式時執行的編輯控制項的自訂初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂控制項的顯示特性，設定所傳回的物件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>屬性，而不是設定所傳回的控制項屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> in which the user will edit the selected cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>使用者將在其中編輯選取的儲存格內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>代表正在編輯的儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell style of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定已編輯的儲存格的儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the CellStyle property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂控制項的顯示特性，設定 CellStyle 屬性所傳回，而非設定控制項的屬性所傳回之物件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>代表正在編輯的儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值設定這個屬性時是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The control shown to the user for editing the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: 編輯選取的儲存格的值對使用者顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the Control property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂控制項的顯示特性，設定所傳回的物件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>屬性，而不是設定控制項的控制項屬性所傳回的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that displays an area for the user to enter or change the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> ，會顯示一個區域，讓使用者輸入或變更所選資料格的值。
